entry.title: $2385 // TOTALLY NO FEE! RENOVATED 1 BR! HUGE LIVING-SPACE! 5 MIN FROM SUBWAY
entry.content:
The Building is close to the 86th Street #4,5,6 Subway lines as well as the 2nd Avenue Subway Q Train. Live in super. Convenient to 86th Street shopping, Whole Foods and Fairway Supermarket. Other desirable amenities also include Equinox Gym, Soul Cycle, The Penrose, Shake Shack, The Meatball Shop, The Comic Strip and H&H Bagels.


Bright and Sunny 1 Bedroom apartment with renovated stainless kitchen includes a dishwasher and microwave, updated bathroom, finished floors.


The Kitchen features:

Full Size Steel Appliances,

Microwave,

Dishwasher,

Granite Countertops,

Wood Cabinets.



The Apartment Features:

Exposed Brick,

Hardwood Floors,

Central A/C units,

High Ceilings,

Marble Bathroom,

Plenty Closet Space .
